About me
My name is Danila
I am a young graduate from South-Eastern University of Applied Sciences (Mikkeli campus). I am a front-end developer with couple years of experience. I am creating a high-performance and rich-interactive websides that works on all platforms and devices. I have a great desire to work and learn new things.

In my free time I love reading books and play the guitar as a hooby. I also enjoy photography and photo & video editing.
Web-development
Creating beautiful, interactive and responsive web-sites for personal or corporate use. Building web-pages from ready design or from scratch.
Application development
Development of crossplatform mobile and web applications like online shops or serives, for different purposes.
UI/UX Design
Creating a modern colorful design for web-pages. Great interface and experience for your customers.

Experience

How can I be useful

Ecucation

  • South-Eastern University of Applied Science

    Bachelor degree | Mikkeli (2015-2020)
    Since 2015 till 2020 I have been studied in Mikkeli cumpus of hilighted university. My degree was "Information Technology" where we studied Networking and Programming.

  • Business college

    Helsinki (2022-till now)
    Currently I am studing in the Helsinki Business Coledge. The name of degree is "Vocational qualification in business". I want to be a profeccioanl not only in the technical aspect of web-development, but in business are also. My plan is to create my own business in the future.

  • Udemy

    Web-dewelopment courses
    Udemy is an online school with a big amount of corses. This is a platfom where I develop new skills and honing my skills in web-development and design.

Work experience

  • Front-End Developer trainig

    Firmly agency | Summer 2019
    As a summer training I was a part of Firmly Agency company. My tasks were creating of a web-pages, web-sites administration and searching for new customers. It was a great experince, because I faced both development and customer service parts. It also was a reason why I wanted to discover business area of the IT field.

Skills

What I use in my work
HTML5
It creates the skeleton of your site or application, and the fifth version will allow me to create a more SEO-optimized structure of your product
CSS3
This style language allows me to create absolutely any look for your site or application. Everything is limited only by your imagination!
Java Script
This programming language allows you to bring anything to life: sliders, windows, tooltips, tabs, receiving data from the server, and much more.
Jquery
The Jquery library will speed up development. Without the need to integrate it into the project, we will not, but the skill of working with it is present
React
This library allows you to create web applications. We can create the most interactive product for your purposes
Node.js
This platform allows you to create a backend for your product - "brains" that will perform actions that the user does not see
Mongo.db
This is a non-relational database that will store your website or application data.
